title: terminal-portfolio
description: (this) Terminal Portfolio website made with React, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.

title: razer-mouse-battery-notify
description: A Python script that shows the battery level of a Razer Viper V2 Pro Wireless mouse (or other Razer mouse with modification) as a notification to your Home Assistant.

title: django-comichost
description: Comic hosting website made with Python, Django, PostgreSQL deployed to Heroku.

title: burrito-bot
description: Discord and Twitch bot for the burrito guy server written with NodeJS; listens for clips and post on discord as well as other commands. Deployed on AWS.

title: django-chatapp
description: Real time Chat Room App made with Python, Django, Javascript, and AJAX.

title: Boston Crime EDA
description: Basic EDA with Boston's crime data from 2012 - 2015.

title: MultiWeather
description: Android app that makes API calls, parses receiving JSON data for weather information, and aggregates those data. Final project for CS410.

title: AccelerometerPlay
description: Simple app that uses phone's sensor - Final project for CS443.
